text: Hill House School is a preparatory school in Knightsbridge, London, England. It was started in 1951 by Lt. Col. Stuart Townend. It is for boys and girls aged 4 to 11. The school only allowed male students until 1981. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1951 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Schools in London Category:1950s establishments in England
title: Hill House School
